file.name: expected_valid_optional_body_wrapped.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Fruits
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /add/path:
    get:
      operationId: getAddPath
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidFruitAmount'
        required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
        '400':
          description: 'Invalid value for: body'
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
components:
  schemas:
    ValidFruitAmount:
      required:
        - fruit
        - amount
      type: object
      properties:
        fruit:
          type: string
          minLength: 4
        amount:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          minimum: 1

Error: notImplemented: path "/add/path": get: responses: 400: contents: unsupported content types: [text/plain]
